Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli O111 (MIC=0.3 µg/mL);Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 4163 (MIC=1 µg/mL).Fungi:Candida albicans 3135A (MIC=3 µg/mL).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: It shows strong activity against Gram-negative bacteria, but lesser activity against Gram-positive bacteria and yeast.
Sequence Information.Caution: the sequence displayed is N-terminal sequence of P15.

Literature.Title: Isolation and characterisation of antimicrobial peptides from deer neutrophils.
Literature.Author: Treffers C, Chen L, Anderson RC, Yu PL.
